title: Google Sparks Backlash After Gmail Setting Lets Gemini Peek Inside Inboxes
contentSnippet: Google has faced criticism after a buried setting allowed Gemini to scan inboxes and calendars without clear notice to users.

title: Bitcoin Giant Strategy Could Shed Billions If Removed From Stock Indices: JPMorgan
contentSnippet: Analysts from the investment banking giant wrote in a note Thursday that removal from MSCI indices could lead to $2.8 billion in outflows.

title: Tether’s Gold Hoard Surges to 116 Tons, Rivals Small Central Banks
contentSnippet: Jefferies said that stablecoin giant Tether has quietly become one of the gold market’s most influential new buyers.

title: JPMorgan says crypto market correction appears driven by retail selling of bitcoin and ether ETFs
contentSnippet: Retail investors have sold about $4 billion of spot BTC and ETH ETFs in November — the main driver of the latest crypto market correction.

title: America's Open Source AI Gambit: Two Labs, One Question—Can the US Compete?
contentSnippet: Deep Cogito's model builds on Chinese foundations while Allen Institute starts from scratch. Both aim to counter China's dominance in open AI.

title: Myriad Moves: Markets Grow Bearish on Bitcoin and Ethereum as Rate Cut Odds Tumble
contentSnippet: Top markets on Myriad this week include predictions on where Bitcoin and Ethereum are headed next, plus if the Fed will cut rates again this year.

title: Block’s faster innovation and improving Cash App credit metrics draw analyst optimism
contentSnippet: Square is beginning to reaccelerate as refreshed merchant tools and a tighter sales push improve traction across key verticals.

title: Bitcoin Sell-Off Led by Mid-Cycle Wallets While Long-Term Whales Hold Firm: VanEck
contentSnippet: VanEck says bitcoin’s downturn is being driven by mid-cycle wallets while the oldest holders keep accumulating, with futures data showing washed-out market conditions.

title: Crypto Lobbyists Pitching Trump on Getting Things Done During Congress' Uncertainty
contentSnippet: Industry groups signed a letter to President Donald Trump calling for new tax policy and agency action on initiatives apart from Congress' market structure work.

title: FG Nexus Is the Latest Ethereum Treasury Firm to Sell ETH as Its Stock Craters
contentSnippet: Shares in publicly traded Ethereum treasury firm FG Nexus fell further after the firm parted with some of its ETH.

title: VerifiedX taps Crypto.com for custody, OTC services supporting $1.5 billion in assets
contentSnippet: The price of VFX, the network's native token, has jumped by over 69% following the announcement of a second partnership with Crypto.com.

title: Kalshi Raises $1B at $11B Valuation as Prediction Market Race Continues: TechCrunch
contentSnippet: The CFTC-regulated exchange is gaining ground on crypto-native Polymarket, offering event contracts with fiat access and legal clarity.

title: Ray Dalio Owns Bitcoin. He’s Still Nervous About Quantum Computing, Central Bank Adoption
contentSnippet: The billionaire investor previously urged people to buy gold.

title: Poll Shows Young Conservatives More Willing to Give AI Control Over Policy and Military
contentSnippet: The findings contrast with long-running concerns about political bias in major AI systems.

title: Elon Musk Is the Most Fit, Intelligent and Handsome Person Alive—Says Grok AI
contentSnippet: Elon Musk's chatbot went viral for declaring him the most wonderful man on earth—fitter than LeBron, smarter than da Vinci, and definitely not biased at all.

title: Argentina’s Milei provided ‘essential collaboration’ for Libra project, congressional report finds
contentSnippet: An Argentine congressional committee released a 200-page report finding a pattern of misconduct in President Javier Milei's Libra crypto promotions.

title: Bitcoin Billionaire Dumps Entire $1.3 Billion BTC Stash After 14 Years: Arkham
contentSnippet: A Bitcoin whale appears to have sold his entire crypto stash for $1.3 billion—14 years after first buying BTC, says Arkham Intelligence.

title: Anthony Scaramucci-Backed AVAX One Approves $40M Stock Buyback
contentSnippet: Digital asset treasury firms are increasingly turning to share buybacks to arrest plunging stock prices as investor demand sours.

title: Trump's CFTC Pick, Mike Selig, Clears Hurdle on Way Toward Confirmation Vote
contentSnippet: The day after his confirmation hearing, the Senate Agriculture Committee made a quick vote to push Mike Selig toward the overall Senate for a final vote.

title: Lawmakers clear Trump pick Michael Selig to lead the CFTC, sending it to full Senate
contentSnippet: President Donald Trump's pick to lead the CFTC, Michael Selig, advanced on Thursday as it heads to the full Senate for the next vote.

title: Metaplanet to Offer Dividend-Paying Preferred Shares to Buy More Bitcoin, Echoing Strategy
contentSnippet: Strategy has issued similar products this year.

title: The Daily: Bitwise debuts spot XRP ETF, RippleX engineer explores potential for native XRP staking, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Rep. Davidson introduces bill to allow taxes to be paid in BTC, bolstering the US Strategic Bitcoin Reserve
contentSnippet: A new bill is circulating in Washington that would allow people and companies in the U.S. to pay federal taxes in bitcoin.

title: MegaETH to open pre-deposit window for USDm stablecoin next week
contentSnippet: USDm will be minted through Ethena’s USDtb system, giving the new stablecoin a reserve structure similar to one used by existing institutional-grade offerings.

title: Crypto Exchange Ripio Reveals $100M Crypto Treasury, Second Largest in Latin America
contentSnippet: The company's holdings, which include bitcoin and ether, have been managed through trading and hedging strategies since 2017.

title: JPMorgan says Strategy could face billions in outflows if MSCI and other major indices remove it
contentSnippet: Strategy could see about $2.8B in outflows if MSCI removes it from its indices, and another $8.8B if other index providers follow.

title: Ray Dalio Still Owns Bitcoin, but Says Traceability and Quantum Threat Are Concerns
contentSnippet: The billionaire founder of hedge fund Bridgewater believes Bitcoin faces major hurdles before it can become a global reserve currency.

title: British fraud office arrests two men accused of $28 million Basis Markets rug pull
contentSnippet: The Basis Markets project raised $28 million in late 2021, but never launched the platform it claimed to be working on, and went dark shortly after, offering no refunds.

title: HBAR Faces Fresh Liquidity Alarms After Breakdown to $0.1373
contentSnippet: Hedera’s token slipped below key support levels as a late-session trading halt, collapsing volume, and failed recovery attempts point to mounting structural and liquidity stress.

title: ICP Breaks Below Key Support as Volume Surges at Resistance Test
contentSnippet: Heavy trading activity during a failed rebound attempt pushed ICP into a tighter consolidation zone below $4.95, reinforcing short-term downside risk.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash
contentSnippet: Top Ethereum NFT collections like BAYC, Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks remain in the red despite a partial market recovery after Friday’s crypto market crash.

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
contentSnippet: Fantasy sports crypto platform Sorare is migrating from Ethereum to Solana, with its CEO saying it is a better fit for Sorare due to its scalability and focus on consumer applications.

title: How to use Google’s Gemini to research coins before you invest
contentSnippet: Google’s Gemini AI can help organize research, compare tokenomics and cut through noise. Here’s a workflow to analyze coins before you invest responsibly.
